ygData.subject: Mistmoore and unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Having recently hit lvl 29, I left the Lake and FM zones for Mistmoore... dying six times in two days and a lvl lower, my party, in the same boat, has voted to
ygData.messageBody:
Having recently hit lvl 29, I left the Lake and FM
zones for Mistmoore...

dying six times in two days and a lvl lower, my party,
in the same boat, has voted to hit Unrest, thinking we
might have better luck there. (any suggestions on
hunting in Mistmoore? ... the alcove and graveyard
proved disasterous for my party lvls 22-29)

Questions: If I am singing DDD on the second floor of
the House in Unrest, will I be pulling mobs on other
floors?

What part of Unrest is good for a mid/high 20s group?

Thanks to all,

Tyunes
Climbing back to 29th lvl
